author: sdeboy
msg: - reorganized logpanel - added complete javadoc comments, applied jalopy formatting, removed unused methods, reduced scope of variables and visibility of methods where possible
- logpanel's tablemodel no longer exposed to other classes, added helper methods where needed
- removed unused methods and renamed methods to clarify functionality
- removed location from chainsaw's default eventdetail layout

author: sdeboy
msg: Detail panel now displays location info if available

author: sdeboy
msg: set responsiveness value to correct range (seconds) even if they are loading a settings file with a value in the 1000s (milliseconds)

author: sdeboy
msg: - Added 'best fit column' feature, accessible via context menu
